Services

类 Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.Rule

  • public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
    Rule describes the rules of dealing cards.

    This class must be implicitly instantiated.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Rule(int numOfDecks, int numOfPlayers, int numOfDraw, boolean includeJokers)
      Constructor of the class Rule.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Rule

        public Rule(int numOfDecks,
            int numOfPlayers,
            int numOfDraw,
            boolean includeJokers)
        Constructor of the class Rule.
        参数:
        numOfDecks - the quantity of decks you want to use in the game.(Should be no less than 1)
        numOfPlayers - the quantity of players you want to have in your game.(Game won't be able to start until enough players join the game)
        numOfDraw - the quantity of cards each player will draw(If set as 0,cards would be dealt evenly.)
        includeJokers - indicates whether the decks in game include jokers.
